org.apache.juneau

Class BeanSessionArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.SessionArgs
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanSessionArgs
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParserSessionArgs, SerializerSessionArgs

    public class BeanSessionArgs
extends SessionArgs
    Runtime arguments common to all bean, serializer, and parser sessions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanSessionArgs

        public BeanSessionArgs()
        Constructor

      • BeanSessionArgs

        public BeanSessionArgs(ObjectMap properties,
                       Locale locale,
                       TimeZone timeZone,
                       MediaType mediaType,
                       HttpPartSchema schema,
                       Boolean debug)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        properties - Session-level properties.
        These override context-level properties.
        Can be null.
        locale - The session locale.
        If null, then the locale defined on the context is used.
        timeZone - The session timezone.
        If null, then the timezone defined on the context is used.
        mediaType - The session media type (e.g. "application/json").
        Can be null.
        schema - The part schema for the serialized part.
        Can be null.
        debug - Enable debug mode for this session.
        Can be null to use the debug setting on the bean context..

      • BeanSessionArgs

public BeanSessionArgs(ObjectMap properties,
